titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: PROCEDURE YEAR AND MONTH (NEWBORN HEARING SCREENING) - Description

div.p: PROCEDURE YEAR AND MONTH (NEWBORN HEARING SCREENING) is the year and month of the recorded PROCEDURE DATE when Newborn Hearing Screening was performed.

For the National Neonatal Data Set - Episodic and Daily Care, PROCEDURE YEAR AND MONTH (NEWBORN HEARING SCREENING) is submitted instead of PROCEDURE DATE AND TIME (NEWBORN HEARING SCREENING), where the data set record is anonymised.
